recipesJson.name: Buckeye Shake
recipesJson.author: Dank1
recipesJson.description: This is a Tribute to Ohio. A chocolate and peanut butter milk shake. Goooooo!!! Buckeyes!!!!!

reviews.text: I didn't have the gelato concentrate, so I just did 6% vbic.  Still, this turned out pretty good.  I may circle back around to this later and add maybe half a percent of cap peanut butter to add a little more peanut to the mix.  Not that I find your recipe lacking, rather, better recipes always make me want to play around and see what else can be done.
